movies.title: New Kids Turbo
movies.plot: Five friends from 'Maaskantje' are being fired because of the economic crisis. They decide not to pay for anything anymore. They're stealing beer and food, while the police tries to end their efforts. Unfortunately, the cop from Maaskantje is unable to stop the five friends so the minister of defense decides to send help....
movies.simplePlot: Five friends from 'Maaskantje' are getting fired because of the economic crisis. They decide that they won't pay for anything anymore.

biography.bio: Huub Smit is an actor, known for New Kids Turbo (2010), New Kids Nitro (2011) and Bro's Before Ho's (2013).
biography.name: Huub Smit

biography.bio: Tim Haars (1981) is an Actor, based in Amsterdam The Netherlands. During High School he accelerates as Agressive Inline Skater, wins the Annual Dutch Championship twice and travels around as a professional International inline Skater. In 2001 he decides to focus on his other ambition; becoming an Actor. He starts working for television and works as an actor as well as presenter for several different Dutch TV programs. Amongst them the famous series "6pack" and "Villa Achterwerk". In 2009 he stars as one of the main characters Gerrie in the popular TV series "New Kids". Followed by two feature films based on the series; "New Kids Turbo" and "New Kids Nitro". Both films become a major box office success, not only in The Netherlands but also in Germany and a large part of Eastern Europe. In 2013 he continued working with the creatives of New Kids and stars as the main character in feature film "BROs BEFORE HOs". After the New Kids success he gets the chance to show his broad ability as an actor in high quality series as "Van God Los" and "Bureau Raampoort" where he stars as one of the two main characters. In 2016 two films release; "Familieweekend" and the TV movie "Fake".
biography.name: Tim Haars

biography.bio: Wesley van Gaalen is an actor, known for New Kids Turbo (2010), New Kids Nitro (2011) and Familieweekend (2016).
biography.name: Wesley van Gaalen

biography.bio: Director, writer, and actor Steffen Haars is working as a duo with Flip van der Kuil. Together they've had a huge success with the TV-show New Kids, which became a phenomenon in the Netherlands and across Europe. After the successful TV-series, production company Eyeworks (Kaap Holland Film) gave them the chance to turn their show into a movie. 1.6 Million people flocked the Dutch theaters to see the blockbusters New Kids Turbo and the sequel New Kids Nitro, written and directed by Haars and Van der Kuil. Haars also stars as one of the main characters Robbie Schuurmans in the popular New Kids sketches and films. The New Kids blockbusters not only became a hit in The Netherlands, but were also successful in Belgium, Japan, Scandinavia, etc. In Germany, New Kids Turbo was the biggest Dutch film release ever. On top of the success at the box-office, the movies also won several awards at film festivals, like New Kids Turbo - Best Director Comedy Fantastic Fest 2011 and New Kids Nitro - Best Comedy Fantastic Fest 2012. In 2011 Haars and van der Kuil wrote and directed a new movie, the romantic comedy: BROs BEFORE HOs. BROs BEFORE HOs also had Haars and Van der Kuil's trademark sense of humor. They love to push the boundaries of comedy. As a solo director Steffen directs commercials and directed the episode Dead Man's Hand of the Dutch television series Van God Los. In April 2016 Steffen and Flip announced their upcoming comedy Ron Goossens, Low Budget Stuntman, written and directed by the duo. It will be released in February 2017.
biography.name: Steffen Haars

biography.bio: Director, writer, editor and actor Flip van der Kuil is working as a duo with Steffen Haars. Together they've had a huge success with the TV-show New Kids, which became a phenomenon in the Netherlands and across Europe. After the successful TV-series, production company Eyeworks (Kaap Holland Film) gave them the chance to turn their show into a movie. 1.6 Million people flocked the Dutch theaters to see the blockbusters New Kids Turbo and the sequel New Kids Nitro, written and directed by Haars and Van der Kuil, both edited by Flip. Van der Kuil also stars as one of the main characters Barry Butsers in the popular New Kids sketches and films. The New Kids blockbusters not only became a hit in The Netherlands, but were also successful in Belgium, Japan, Scandinavia, etc. In Germany, New Kids Turbo was the biggest Dutch film release ever. On top of the success at the box-office, the movies also won several awards at film festivals, like New Kids Turbo - Best Director Comedy Fantastic Fest 2011 and New Kids Nitro - Best Comedy Fantastic Fest 2012. In 2011 Haars and van der Kuil quit the New Kids franchise and wrote and directed a new movie: BROs BEFORE HOs. Flip was also responsible for the edit of romantic comedy. BROs BEFORE HOs also had Haars and Van der Kuil's trademark sense of humor. They love to push the boundaries of comedy: if it makes them laugh, it's funny and it goes into the movie. That's why BROs BEFORE HOs, just like its predecessors, is such a hilariously funny film. And a big box office hit in the Netherlands. In April 2016 Flip van der Kuil and Steffen Haars announced their upcoming comedy Ron Goossens, Low Budget Stuntman, written and directed by the duo. van der Kuil will also edit the film, which will be released in February 2017.
biography.name: Flip Van der Kuil

biography.bio: Daan van Dijsseldonk was born on November 12, 1986 in Valkenswaard, Noord-Brabant, Netherlands. He is an actor, known for New Kids Turbo (2010), Force (2014) and Bloedbroeders (2008).
biography.name: Daan van Dijsseldonk
